explanations.machine learning: The paper proposes a back propagation neural network optimized via genetic algorithm and pruning algorithm (P-GA-BPNN) for project portfolio benefit evaluation, which is a machine learning approach.
explanations.supervised learning: The model is trained with inputs and expected outputs, which is characteristic of supervised learning.
explanations.neural network: The paper uses a back propagation neural network (BPNN) as the core model for evaluation.
explanations.backpropagation: The model is based on a back propagation neural network, which uses backpropagation for training.
explanations.BP: BP stands for back propagation, which is the training algorithm used in the neural network model.
explanations.support vector machine: The paper compares the proposed model with SVM models in the experiments.
explanations.SVM: SVM is mentioned as one of the comparative models in the experiments.
